name: Assassin
desc: A stealthy hunter who specializes in quick and lethal attacks, excelling in ambushes and evasion.

name: Fighter
desc: A versatile warrior skilled in close combat, capable of both offensive and defensive maneuvers.

name: Healer
desc: A supportive hunter with the ability to heal and protect allies, ensuring the team's survival.

name: Mage
desc: A master of magical arts, capable of casting powerful spells to damage enemies or support allies.

name: Ranger
desc: A ranged attacker who excels in precision and long-distance attacks, often using bows or firearms.

name: Tank
desc: A formidable defender with high endurance, able to absorb damage and protect the team from harm.
